original_text: And there were four undersetters to the four corners of one base: and the undersetters were of the very base itself.
korean_text: 받침 수레 네 모퉁이에 어깨 같은 것 넷이 있는데 그 어깨는 받침 수레와 연결되었고

sentences.original_text: to the four corners of one base:
and the undersetters were of the very base itself.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 받침대들은 바로 그 받침 자체의 일부였다.
